name: Smash 'em Up!
description:
Smash 'em Up! is a an experimental game, derived from the Shoot 'em Up and Beat 'em Up genres. You control a hammer and your only objective is to smash everything comes in your way without getting hit at the vulnerable spots of the hammer.

As the game progresses, the player will level up and receive perks that helps in the smashing process, to reach a higher wave.

What is the highest wave you can reach?
